Metadata.title: Inácio Rodrigues - Portfolio
Metadata.description: Personal portfolio of Inácio Rodrigues - Developer

LandingHome.description: As a versatile software engineer, I excel in my ability to work across all stages of the development lifecycle.

profile.title: What is my professional profile?
profile.content: As a versatile software engineer, I stand out for my ability to work in all stages of the development cycle, from architectural conception to implementation and production deployment. My experience includes the complete construction of microservices-based systems using technologies such as Kubernetes, Docker, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, Django, FastAPI and Angular.

skills.title: What are my technical differentials?
skills.content: My differential lies in technical adaptability to work with any necessary language and in the commitment to efficiency standards that guarantee high performance and scalability. I have expertise in implementing best practices such as SOLID and Object Chalistenics, in addition to advanced caching and load balancing techniques.

education.title: What is my academic background?
education.content: Currently studying Computer Engineering at UFC, I seek to deepen my knowledge in software engineering and develop solutions that combine technical excellence with real impact for users and businesses.

responsibilities.0: - Lead technical validation and implementation of critical features for company systems, ensuring quality and adherence to development best practices
responsibilities.1: - Responsible for analysis, documentation and architecture of current and future projects
responsibilities.2: - Program essential components in various projects using technologies such as FastAPI, Typescript, Fastify, Angular, Django, Python, and infrastructure ecosystem with Docker, Postgres, RabbitMQ and Redis
responsibilities.3: - Implemented deployment strategies on local server that resulted in significant reduction of operational costs
responsibilities.4: - Distinguished myself for speed and quality in deliveries, generating high satisfaction from clients and stakeholders

achievements.0: - Technical leadership in the "Pacto pela Vida" project, developed in partnership with Senai and Argo Tech, a complete system for management and tracking of B&Q collaborators and workflows
achievements.1: - Solo implementation of all project stages, from architecture to production deployment

responsibilities.0: - Collaborated in web application development using modern technologies such as Angular, React, FastAPI and Django
responsibilities.1: - Participated in database solution implementation with PostgreSQL and Redis
responsibilities.2: - Assisted in configuration and maintenance of development environments with Docker
responsibilities.3: - Worked following agile methodologies such as SCRUM and Kanban, in sync with partner companies

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Developer
fullstack.description: Full Stack Developer specialized in creating complete and scalable digital solutions for companies across various segments. I work remotely, offering flexibility and efficiency in developing custom projects.

computerEngineering.title: Computer Engineering
computerEngineering.status: Currently in 10th semester, expected graduation in December 2025.

activities.0: • Volunteer participation in Python software development for UFC's University Extension Program in the project "Evaluation of anthropometric and hematological indicators in children aged 4 to 12 years assisted by Lions Club of Acaraú Ceará, Municipal School of Early Childhood and Elementary Education Comunitário Francisco Barbosa in Maracanaú - Ceará and adolescents assisted by the Family Development Coordination (CDFAM)".
activities.1: • Participation in HackPI Ceara marathon: Hackathon for Early Childhood Ceará in 2021.
activities.2: • Participation in mini-courses on Network Authentication and Convolutional Neural Networks with Tensorflow offered during Information and Communication Technology Week (SETIC) in 2020.
